title: Files never appear to finish downloading / can't clear the notification
content:
Hi community,

When I download a file from Chrome on my Pixel 4, the download eventually reaches XYZ MB / XYZ MB but never becomes 'complete' and the notification showing download progress can't be cleared. However, the file can be viewed by clicking the notification or searching in the Fies app. Example attached.

Appreciate your help getting to the bottom of this!
Sam
